creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: number six of six volumes; woodblock printed books with text and diagrams; many diagrams featuring the construction and layout of tea ceremony room, brooms and brushes, cabinets, shelving units, and water vessels; tan cover; resides in navy blue case with other volumes
markings: (Japanese writing LLC of back page over cover)
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
text: Contemporary guide to tea ceremony, Enshū school.
title: Promulgation of the Contemporary Tea Ceremony, vol. 6
